content:
As you have been traveling with Olyv, you've noticed your shared mentor, Calypsa, secretly watching nearby, although Olyv seems oblivious.

"Well if it isn't Olyv Sol," Calypsa says, emerging from her hiding spot. "This is a surprise! I could have sworn that you had told me you were going to give up and go home. Yet here you are!"

Olyv does her best to mask her surprise. "Did I say that?" she replies playfully. "I guess I changed my mind."

"Nothing would make me happier," says Calypsa. "Are you finally ready to complete your training?"

CHECK HOW MUCH XP IS ON OLYV AND READ THE CORRESPONDING ENTRY:

2  or less XP:

"Ummm…," Olyv hesitates.

Calypsa raises an eyebrow. "I think you may need to spend some more time on the trail, just to be sure," she says.

Discard all   from Olyv.

Between 2  and 4  XP:

"I am," Olyv says. "At least I think I am."

Calypsa smiles, but shakes her head. "I don't know, Olyv. You must be absolutely sure you still want to become a Ranger before you can swear the oaths."

Discard all   from Olyv.

4  or more XP:

"Yes!" Olyv says with confidence. "I am."

"Well, well!" Calypsa says. "It seems to me that you're finally ready to don the cloak."

"You better believe it!" Olyv says, beaming.

"You have proven not only your resilience and understanding, but your dedication as well," Calypsa says. "I am so very proud of you." You can tell from her smiling eyes that she means every word. "Tonight, you will swear your oaths. Tomorrow, you will be a Ranger."

"Oh my gosh! Really??" Bursting with joy, Olyv floats over to you to give you a tight hug. "Thank you!" she says. "I'll never forget this." She gives you one more squeeze, then hurries off to prepare for the ceremony.

Discard Olyv and return HELPING HAND to the collection. Permanently move Olyv to the Valley set. Record OLYV EARNED HER CLOAK on the campaign tracker. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
